P

pacman - package pacman
 
pacman - Variable in class pacman.GamePanel
The abstract pacman object containing one type of non-abstract pacman class - regular super or mighty
PacMan - Class in pacman
 
PacMan(GamePanel, ImageIcon, int) - Constructor for class pacman.PacMan
A constructor for a new pacman, uses its initial start positions.
PacMan(GamePanel, int, int, int, int, ImageIcon, int, int) - Constructor for class pacman.PacMan
A constructor for a new pacman, used when regular pacman turns into mighty or super, which in this case receives the position from the regular pacman, and the icon from the specific pacman.
PACMAN_LIVES - Static variable in class pacman.GamePanel
The initial lives of pacman
pacmanLives - Variable in class pacman.GamePanel
Number of lives remaining
paint(Graphics) - Method in class pacman.GamePanel
The method paint draws the graphics on this panel using double buffering technique.
paint(Graphics) - Method in class pacman.MenuPanel
The paint function is called automatically and paints the panel using DOUBLE BUFFERING.
paintBackground(Graphics) - Method in class pacman.GamePanel
this method paints the background
paintGameCharacters(Graphics) - Method in class pacman.GamePanel
this method paints the game characters.
paintPoints(Graphics) - Method in class pacman.GamePanel
this method paints the points by the current state of each cell.
parent - Variable in class pacman.GameCharacter
The game panel
parent - Variable in class pacman.GamePanel
The Main frame containing this panel
parent - Variable in class pacman.MenuPanel
The Main object containing the panel.
pixelLocationX - Variable in class pacman.GameCharacter
The x,y coordinates of the object in the matrix and in the game panel's image.
pixelLocationY - Variable in class pacman.GameCharacter
The x,y coordinates of the object in the matrix and in the game panel's image.
pixelStartPositionX - Variable in class pacman.GameCharacter
The x,y coordinates of the object in the matrix and in the game panel's image.
pixelStartPositionY - Variable in class pacman.GameCharacter
The x,y coordinates of the object in the matrix and in the game panel's image.
pointMatrix - Variable in class pacman.GamePanel
Matrix indicating the current state of each cell.
